Title: The Ordinary People
Writer: Mathias Gokalp (scenario and dialogue), Nadine Lamari (scenario and dialogue)
Actors: Jean-Pierre Darroussin, Denis Podalydès, Mélanie Doutey, Pascal Greggory
Plot: A pharmaceutical company throws a gala party where all the employees from the top to the bottom are invited. Asked to participate in a role playing game which is actually a massive training...
